meanings.definition: The part of a printer that applies ink to paper.
meanings.sent1: The printheads in the printer sprayed colorful ink on the paper.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to clean the printheads regularly to maintain print quality.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous printheads decided to play a prank by printing upside down.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like printheads, leaving a lasting impression on everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The printheads hummed softly as they worked, creating beautiful images on the paper.

meanings.definition: The component of a printer that transfers digital images onto paper.
meanings.sent1: After replacing the printheads, the printer produced clear images on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The technician adjusted the printheads to ensure accurate image transfer.
meanings.sent3: The printheads were feeling artistic and decided to print a digital masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a set of printheads, transferring thoughts onto the canvas of conversation.
meanings.sent5: The printheads danced across the paper, bringing the digital world to life.

meanings.definition: The mechanism in a printer that controls the flow of ink onto paper.
meanings.sent1: The printheads malfunctioned, causing streaks on the printed pages.
meanings.sent2: The engineer adjusted the printheads to regulate the ink flow.
meanings.sent3: The printheads had a mind of their own and decided to create a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: His fingers moved like printheads, swiftly controlling the flow of information.
meanings.sent5: The printheads worked tirelessly, ensuring each page was perfectly printed.
